name: SongFell
description:
A little girl with a wild imagination has been sent to the edges of the world to find charms to save her dying mother, but it comes with a cost... her own life.
She must go to taverns, caves, forests, and the underworld. Don't get lost says the signs... can you obey that command? Or will you fall like the rest of the family who tried to save her?
(song by ben_burnes)
(Tavern, and cave by Maaot)
(Main SFX by Jonas Tyroller)
